title: Parkinson a Captain of the Maroons- claim

content.question: Which of the following claims about maroons is best supported by the image?

choices.label: They spread information between groups during the Haitian Revolution.
They made treaties with colonial governments to protect their freedom.
They used their expertise in the cultivation of rice on plantations.
They had the ability to defend their freedom from enslavement.

content.answer: They had the ability to defend their freedom from enslavement.
